description: Mobile techniques used by HummingBad, ATT&CK software S0322 v1.1
name: HummingBad (S0322)

techniques.comment: HummingBad can exploit unfixed vulnerabilities in older Android versions to root victim phones.
In July 2016, HummingBad generated more than $300,000 per month in revenue from installing fraudulent apps and displaying malicious advertisements.
HummingBad can create fraudulent statistics inside the official Google Play Store.
